summary: A toolbox of generic helper routines that support the preparation and configuration of ROMS model inputs, covering tasks such as date and time conversion, grid data extraction, spatial interpolation, boundary handling, variable metadata retrieval, climatology processing, and dataset serialization.
business_intent: Enable ocean modelers to streamline the setup of ROMS simulations by providing reusable utilities that ensure correct formatting, time handling, spatial transformations, and metadata management for input datasets.
